questions.question_text: How many numbers of 3-digits can be formed with the digits 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 (repetition of digits not allowed)?
How many numbers between 2000 and 3000 can be formed with the digits 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 (repetition of digits not allowed)?
In how many ways can a person send invitation cards to 4 of his 6 friends if the cards are identical and each selected friend receives one card?
In how many ways can 5 identical prizes be distributed among 8 students if each student can receive any number of prizes (including zero)?
In how many ways can 7 Indians, 5 Pakistanis and 6 Dutch be seated in a row if persons of the same nationality sit together?
There are 5 routes to go from Allahabad to Patna & 4 ways to go from Patna to Kolkata, then how many ways are possible for going from Allahabad to Kolkata via Patna?

There are 4 qualifying examinations to enter into Oxford University: RAT, BAT, SAT, and PAT. An Engineer cannot go to Oxford University through BAT or SAT. A CA on the other hand can go to the Oxford University through the RAT, BAT & PAT but not through SAT. Further there are 3 ways to become a CA (viz., Foundation, Inter & Final). Find the ratio of number of ways in which an Engineer can make it to Oxford University to the number of ways a CA can make it to Oxford University.
How many straight lines can be formed from 8 non-collinear points on the X-Y plane?
If nC3 = nC6, find n.
In how many ways can the letters of the word DELHI be arranged?
In how many ways can the letters of the word PATNA be rearranged?
For the arrangements of the letters of the word PATNA, how many words would start with the letter P?
For the word PATNA, how many words will start with P and end with T?
If nC4 = 70, find n.
If 10Pr = 720, find r.
How many numbers of four digits can be formed with the digits 0, 1, 2, 3 (repetition of digits not allowed)?
How many numbers of four digits can be formed with the digits 0, 1, 2, 3 (repetition of digits being allowed)?
How many numbers between 200 and 1200 can be formed with the digits 0, 1, 2, 3 (repetition of digits not allowed)?
How many numbers between 200 and 1200 can be formed with the digits 0, 1, 2, 3 if repetition of digits is allowed?
If 15Cr = 15C(r+1), find the value of r.
Arjit wants to hold the maximum number of parties among his 20 friends, with each party having the same number of invitees and no repeated sets. How many friends should he invite to each party?
In how many ways can 10 identical presents be distributed among 6 children so that each child gets at least one present?
How many four-digit numbers are possible, if all four digits are unique?
A captain and a vice-captain are to be chosen out of a team having eleven players. How many ways are there to achieve this?
There are five types of envelopes and four types of stamps in a post office. How many ways are there to buy an envelope and a stamp?
In how many ways can Ram choose a vowel and a consonant from the letters of the word ALLAHABAD?
There are three rooms in a motel: one single, one double and one for four persons. How many ways are there to house seven persons in these rooms?
How many ways are there to choose four cards of different suits and different values from a deck of 52 cards?
How many new words are possible from the letters of the word PERMUTATION?
A set of 15 different words are given. In how many ways is it possible to choose a subset of not more than 5 words?
In how many ways can 12 papers be arranged if the best and the worst paper never come together?
In how many ways can the letters of the word 'EQUATION' be arranged so that all the vowels come together?
A man has 3 shirts, 4 trousers and 6 ties. What are the number of ways in which he can dress himself with a combination of all the three?
How many motor vehicle registration numbers of 4 digits can be formed with the digits 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 (no digit being repeated)?
How many motor vehicle registration number plates can be formed with the digits 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 (no digits being repeated) if it is given that registration number can have 1 to 5 digits?
How many straight lines can be formed? (There are 25 points on a plane of which 7 are collinear)
How many triangles can be formed from 25 points on a plane of which 7 are collinear?
How many quadrilaterals can be formed from 25 points on a plane of which 7 are collinear?

There are ten subjects in the school day at St. Vincent's High School but the sixth standard students have only 5 periods in a day. In how many ways can we form a time table for the day for the sixth standard students if no subject is repeated?
There are 8 consonants and 5 vowels in a word jumble. In how many ways can we form 5-letter words having three consonants and 2 vowels?
How many batting orders are possible for the Indian cricket team if there is a squad of 15 to choose from such that Sachin Tendulkar is always chosen?
There are 5 blue socks, 4 red socks and 3 green socks, all different in Debu's wardrobe. He has to select 4 socks from this set. In how many ways can he do so?

A class prefect goes to meet the principal every week. His class has 30 people apart from him. If he has to take groups of three every time he goes to the principal, in how many weeks will he be able to go to the principal without repeating the group of same three which accompanies him?

A class prefect has 30 classmates and takes groups of three to meet the principal. If on the first visit the principal appoints one of the boys as head boy and requires the head boy to accompany the prefect every time, for a maximum of how many weeks can the class prefect ensure that the principal sees a fresh group of three?
How many distinct words can be formed out of the word PROWLING which start with R & end with W?
How many 7-digit numbers are there having the digit 3 three times & the digit 5 four times?
How many 7-digit numbers are there having the digit 3 three times & the digit 0 four times?

From a set of three capital consonants, five small consonants and 4 small vowels how many words can be made each starting with a capital consonant and containing 3 small consonants and two small vowels?
Several teams take part in a competition, each of which must play one game with all the other teams. How many teams took part if they played 45 games in all?
In how many ways a selection can be made of at least one fruit out of 5 bananas, 4 mangoes and 4 almonds?
There are 5 different Jeffrey Archer books, 3 different Sidney Sheldon books and 6 different John Grisham books. The number of ways in which at least one book can be given away is
There are 5 different Jeffrey Archer books, 3 different Sidney Sheldon books and 6 different John Grisham books. Find the number of ways in which at least one book of each author can be given.

There is a question paper consisting of 15 questions. Each question has an internal choice of 2 options. In how many ways can a student attempt one or more questions of the given fifteen questions in the paper?
How many numbers can be formed with the digits 1, 6, 7, 8, 7, 6, 1 so that the odd digits always occupy the odd places?
Five boys of McGraw-Hill Mindworkzz and three girls of IIM Lucknow sit around a round table so that no two girls are together. In how many ways can they sit?

Amita has three library cards and seven books of her interest in the library. Of these books she would not like to borrow the D.I. book unless the Quants book is also borrowed. In how many ways can she take three books?

From a group of 12 dancers, five have to be taken for a stage show. Among them Radha and Mohan decide either both of them would join or none of them would join. In how many ways can the 5 dancers be chosen?
Find the number of 6-digit numbers that can be formed using digits 1-6 once such that the number is divisible by its unit digit (unit digit ≠ 1).

An urn contains 5 boxes each with 5 differently coloured balls. Rangeela wants to pick 5 balls of different colours, one from each box. If from the first box he picks red and second black, what is the maximum number of trials needed (without replacement)?
How many rounds of matches does a knock-out tennis tournament have if it starts with 64 players and every player needs to win one match to move to the next round?
There are N men sitting around a circular table at distinct points. Every possible pair except adjacent ones sings a 2-minute song. Total time = 88 minutes. Find N.
In a chess competition with boys and girls, every student plays one game with every other. 36 matches are boy-boy and 66 are girl-girl. How many matches are boy-girl?
Zada distributes 15 chocolates among 5 children (Sana, Ada, Jiya, Amir, Farhan). Sana gets at least 3 and at most 6 chocolates. How many ways if each gets at least one?
Mr. Shah divides ₹30 crores among 3 sons (Ajay, Vijay, Arun) ensuring each gets at least ₹5 crores in multiples of ₹1 crore. In how many ways can this be done?
Three non-negative integers x, y, z sum to 30. No two variables equal, and exactly one ≤ 3. Find number of possible solutions.
The letters of ALLAHABAD are rearranged alphabetically in a dictionary. What is the page number of LABADALAH?
If x, y, z ∈ {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7}, find number of solutions of x + y + z = 12.
There are nine non-collinear points on a plane. Find number of triangles formed.
There are nine points on a plane such that exactly three are collinear. Find number of triangles formed.
If xy is a 2-digit number and u, v, x, y are digits, find number of solutions of (xy)² = uv + v.
Find the number of arrangements of letters of ALLAHABAD such that exactly 4 A's come together.
18 people (including parents) from a family go to cinema in 3 cars taking 7, 6, 5 people in the first, second and third car. Parents never sit in same car. How many ways?
Five people sit in a row. Two of them don't want to sit together. Find total arrangements excluding these unwanted cases.
100 candidates apply for a job. 90 are indistinguishable, 10 are distinct. Director ranks top 10. How many rankings have all 10 distinct at top?
For how many integers n (1 ≤ n ≤ 88) is n(n+1)/2 a perfect square?
How many 6-digit numbers are divisible by 11 and use each digit 0-9 at most once?
Social network has 80 million members. Each person has 20 friends. Find total friendships if no two people share more than one friend.
Social network with 1000 people. If total friendships = 2002. Max friends one person can have?
Restaurant has 15 entrees, 12 main courses, 10 desserts. Customer orders: 2 entrees, 1 main, 2 desserts. How many ways?
From 5 men, 4 women select committee of 3 with at least 1 woman but women never outnumber men. How many ways?
5 daisies, 4 roses, 3 tulips in shop. Customer wants bouquet of 5 with exactly 2 daisies and at least one of each other flower. Ways?
Distribute 25 balls into 5 boxes. Each box gets at least 2 balls. First two boxes have equal balls. How many ways?
All anagrams of FACTOR are arranged alphabetically. What position is FACTOR?
ORRRRR → Replace 4 R's with 4 distinct letters from B,C,D,E,F. How many results are palindromes?
Draw cards from deck without replacement until 4 aces obtained. What is probability last card is ace of spades?
On 8×8 chessboard, how many shortest paths from bottom-left to top-right that pass through center?
8 beads on necklace: 3 red, 3 blue, 2 green. Arrangements where no two green beads are adjacent?
12 distinct books on shelf. How many arrangements where books 1&2 are not adjacent and books 3&4 are not adjacent?
How many 7-digit numbers formed from 1,2,3,4,5,6,7 (no repetition) are divisible by 9?
From 20 points on circle, select 4 points such that no 3 are vertices of inscribed equilateral triangle. Max selections?
Person moves on 4×4 grid from (0,0) to (3,3). Only right/up moves allowed. How many paths don't pass through (2,2)?
10 cars (5 red, 5 blue) in parking lot. How many arrangements where no 3 consecutive cars are same color?
Cricket team: 15 players total (6 batsmen, 4 bowlers, 5 all-rounders). Select 11 with ≥4 batsmen, ≥3 bowlers, ≥2 all-rounders. Ways?
How many 6-digit numbers can be formed using digits 1,2,3,4,5,6 exactly once such that number is >345000?
20 identical books distributed among 4 students. Each gets ≥3 books. First student gets even number. How many ways?
Regular pentagon. How many ways to select 3 vertices such that they don't form right triangle?
Password: 8 characters from 26 letters + 10 digits. Must have ≥1 letter and ≥1 digit. No repetition allowed. How many?
How many integers from 1-1000 have digit sum divisible by 4?
Round table with 8 seats. 4 couples. Each couple sits together. How many seating arrangements?
Select committee of 7 from 20 people (12 men, 8 women). At least 3 women, and number of women must be odd. Ways?
2×n rectangular board. How many ways to tile with 1×2 dominoes when n=6?
How many anagrams of MATHEMATICS have exactly 2 M's together but not all 3 M's together?
How many 10-digit binary strings have no three consecutive 1's?
In expansion of (1+x+x²+x³)¹⁰, what is coefficient of x²⁰?
Distribute 52 cards equally among 4 players. Probability that each player gets one ace?
Single elimination tournament with 16 players. How many different bracket arrangements?
Set S = {1,2,3,...,100}. How many subsets have no two consecutive integers?
How many arrangements of ABCDEFGHIJ have no letter in its alphabetical position?
A cube is divided into 1000 unit cubes. How many unit cubes have exactly one face painted if original cube faces are painted?
How many positive integers ≤10000 have digit sum = 9?
In how many ways can you place 8 non-attacking rooks on a chessboard such that no rook is on main diagonal?
How many 3×3 matrices with entries from {0,1} have determinant = 1?
Complete graph K₁₀. How many spanning trees are there?
Coefficient of x¹⁵ in (1+x+x²+...)²⁰?
In how many ways can 7 distinct objects be partitioned into non-empty subsets?
How many ways to parenthesize a product of 6 matrices?
52 cards dealt to 4 players (13 each). Probability all 4 aces in same hand?
How many surjective functions from set of 8 elements to set of 5 elements?
Lattice paths from (0,0) to (10,10) that don't go above line y=x. How many?
How many distinct necklaces with 8 beads using 3 colors?
How many permutations of 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9 have exactly 3 fixed points?
Number of ways to arrange n distinct objects in a circle where clockwise and counterclockwise are different (n=7)?
How many ways to color vertices of regular hexagon with 4 colors such that adjacent vertices have different colors?
Number of partitions of 20 into distinct odd parts?
How many binary strings of length 12 are periodic with period dividing 4?
a₀=1, a₁=2, aₙ=3aₙ₋₁-2aₙ₋₂ for n≥2. Find a₁₀.
Coefficient of x₁²x₂³x₃⁴x₄⁵ in expansion of (x₁+x₂+x₃+x₄)¹⁴?
How many standard Young tableaux of shape (4,3,2)?
How many distinct ways to arrange 4 identical red and 4 identical blue beads on a square bracelet?
Minimum number of people needed to guarantee either 4 mutual friends or 4 mutual strangers?
L₀=2, L₁=1, Lₙ=Lₙ₋₁+Lₙ₋₂. What is L₁₀?
How many positive integers ≤1000 are relatively prime to 1000?
How many partitions of 15 into distinct parts?
Chromatic polynomial of cycle graph C₆ evaluated at k=3?
Complete bipartite graph K₅,₅. How many perfect matchings?
Permanent of 3×3 matrix with all entries = 1?
Coefficient of x¹⁰ in (1-x)⁻⁵?
Elementary symmetric polynomial e₃(x₁,x₂,x₃,x₄) has how many terms?
Number of convergents of [2;1,2,1,2,1,2] (finite continued fraction)?
Hamming(7,4) code can detect how many bit errors?
q-binomial coefficient [5;2]q at q=2 equals?
How many 3×3 Latin squares are there (up to isomorphism)?
How many irreducible polynomials of degree 3 over GF(2)?
Dimension of symmetric algebra S³(C²)?
How many linear extensions does the Boolean lattice B₃ have?
Rank of uniform matroid U₃,₅?
Exponential generating function for labeled rooted trees on n vertices?
Coefficient of zⁿ in (1-4z)⁻¹/² grows asymptotically as?
Dimension of graded component Sym₃ in symmetric functions?
Number of cluster variables in type A₃?
Number of positive roots in root system A₄?
q-dimension of vector representation of Uq(sl₂) at q=i?
Number of vertices of tropical polytope Δ₂ in R³?
Growth rate of free group F₂?
Euler characteristic of Klein bottle?
Alexander polynomial of trefoil knot at t=1?
Number of morphisms in free category on graph with 2 vertices and 3 edges (loops allowed)?
